parameters.name: n_neighbors
parameters.description: Number of neighbors to use for k-neighbors queries. Smaller values are more sensitive to noise.

parameters.name: weights
parameters.description: Weight function: 'uniform' gives equal weight to all neighbors, 'distance' weights by inverse distance.

parameters.name: algorithm
parameters.description: Algorithm used to compute nearest neighbors. 'auto' selects the best based on training data.

parameters.name: leaf_size
parameters.description: Leaf size for BallTree or KDTree. Affects construction speed and memory usage.

parameters.name: p
parameters.description: Power parameter for Minkowski metric. p=1 is Manhattan distance, p=2 is Euclidean distance.

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Distance metric to use for computing distances between points.
